title: Do you think DJ sona will be on sale? VOTE!
body: I am going to say that i think... she will NOT be on sale since riot is so hesitant on it and she is the best skin ever released. Either way i am buying that amazing skin! But hopefully she will be on sale like udyr .

replies.body: She'll be on sale for a small discount - which is yet to be determined.
Really? i googled it before posting and i couldnt find it. Damn i feel/look stupid >.>/ Thanks for clearing that up tho!

97%?

EDIT:To be very clear i am joking,

Please say 50% :d
Otherwise i wont have enough RP :CCCC
And here i thought i had saved enough Uhhh! 
Rip in piece me :C{{champion:37}} {{item:3026}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=3kT02grL,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-10T01:42:34.887+0000)
>
> She'll be on sale for a small discount - which is yet to be determined.

like 2k RP?
2050 RP means it's a 37% discount. Given that SGU was a 40% discount and not said to be "small", I'd say you should probably start drawing.
Is there any chance there could be a bundle for three ultimate skins? Would totally empty my wallet for that!
Somewhere, Riot notified that she will be on discount price right after release.
They've already stated she will get a small discount like all the other ultimate skin! It's just we don't have a set price on it right now and probably won't till she is ready for release!
